text: Jason A. Scott (born February 11, 1970) is an American rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Seattle Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States Category:Rowers at the 1991 Pan American Games
title: Jason Scott (rower)
